page.title: 10CORNISH GLIDING CLUB
page.content: THE CLUB IS ACTIVE THROUGHOUT THE YEAR AND IS ESPECIALLY BUSY DURING THE SUMMER AND AT WEEKENDS .DURING THE SUMMER AS MANY AS TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY PEOPLE MAY ATTEND COURSES AT THE AIRFIELD .THE CLUB GIVES FLYING LESSONS AT WEEKENDS AND THESE COST Â£1.85 OR 10P PER MINUTE .ALTERNATIVELY YOU CAN JOIN THE CLUB FOR AN ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION OF Â£60.YOU DON'T NEED A LICENCE TO LEARN BUT WHEN YOU CAN FLY SOLO YOU HAVE TO SEND OFF FOR A LICENCE .YOU HAVE TO BE SIXTEEN TO FLY SOLO BUT YOU CAN START AT ANY AGE BUT FIFTEEN IS BEST .IT USUALLY TAKES ABOUT SEVENTY LESSONS BEFORE YOU CAN FLY SOLO .YOU CAN GO AS A PASSENGER FOR THE FIRST FLIGHT TO SEE WHAT IT IS LIKE .IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO KNOW MORE YOU CAN RING THE{CORNISH GLIDING {(& FLYING) CLUB}ON (957) 2124.
